title: Wrapped Reichstag, Project for Berlin
medium: graphite, charcoal, pastel, wax crayon, photography by Wolfgang Volz, printed elevation drawing, technical data, fabric sample, and tape, on two sheets of paper in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (top panel): 37.8 x 243.2 cm (14 7/8 x 95 3/4 in.)
sheet (bottom panel): 106.3 x 243.5 cm (41 7/8 x 95 7/8 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 147 x 244 cm (57 7/8 x 96 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Christo and Jeanne-Claude in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
